Package Controller

Class KickOffController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
Controller.KickOffController
public class KickOffController extends Controller
Class that controls the showtime entity

    • checkHoliday

      public boolean checkHoliday(String stringDate) throws ParseException
      Checks if the input date is a holiday (Weekends or in Holiday Dates)
      Parameters:
      stringDate - Date of the showDate in String format ("dd/M/yyyy")
      Returns:
      true if date is holiday, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ParseException - used to throw an exception if String is in wrong format

    • addTicketType

      public TicketType addTicketType(String ticketName, Type movieType, boolean isHoliday, SeatType seatType, MovieGoerType movieGoerType, float price)
      Add new Ticket Type to list
      Parameters:
      ticketName - The name of ticket
      movieType - The movie type of ticket
      isHoliday - Whether it is Public Holiday or Weekend Ticket
      seatType - The seat type of ticket (eg. Couple seat, platinum..)
      movieGoerType - The Movie Goer Type (eg. Elderly, Student..)
      price - The price of ticket
      Returns:
      returns the newly added ticket type if successful, null otherwise
